name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Deep Enigma
storyline: The path ahead is shadowed by the serpent.
summary:
Version 3.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the 'From the Deep Ocean' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Argent Knight: Artemis (Rita), Phantom Iron (Rita) & Striker Fulminata (Mei)
• New ELF System with 2 ELFs: Jingwei's Wings & Blood Embrace
• New Story Chapter IX-EX 2: Dark Serpent
• New Story Chapter X: Under the Deep
• New Team Raid: Eye of the Deep
• Level Cap Increase to 82
• ...and more!
